p: At this time point there was also an increase of MMP9 in the EPA-group in comparison to the Control group (Fig. 4C) and an increase in TIMP-1 in IL-10 −/− mice in comparison to Control group (Fig. 4C). On the other hand, there is a reduction of TIMP-1 in the IL10 −/− mice treated with EPA-rich oil in comparison to IL10 −/− mice (Fig. 4C).
